  <description>

    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:aspect.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_52f9386bc83fe7574bfae6ed0fb93b5b15b65159</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_52f9386bc83fe7574bfae6ed0fb93b5b15b65159</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Radioactive decay graphs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Radioaktive Zerfalldiagramme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Graphiques radioactifs d'affaiblissement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Gráficos radioativos da deterioração</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Grafici radioattivi di deperimento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ραδιενεργές γραφικές παραστάσεις αποσύνθεσης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Gráficos radiactivos del decaimiento</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The graphs show the exponential decay of a radioactive substance in time. Left graph illustrates the half-life of a substance as it decays in time. Right graph shows the radioactive decay of two materials, one having a shorter half-life than the other.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">radioactive decay</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">radioactive substances</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">half-life</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">radioactive materials</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">radioactivity</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Diagramme zeigen den exponentialen Zerfall 
einer radioaktiven Substanz in der Zeit. Linkes Diagramm 
veranschaulicht die Halbwertzeit einer Substanz, während es in der 
Zeit verfällt. Rechtes Diagramm zeigt den radioaktiven Zerfall 
von zwei Materialien, einen, der eine kürzere Halbwertzeit als der 
andere hat.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les graphiques montrent l'affaiblissement 
exponentiel d'une substance radioactive à temps. Le graphique 
gauche illustre la demi vie d'une substance pendant qu'il se délabre 
à temps. Le bon graphique montre l'affaiblissement radioactif 
de deux matériaux, un ayant une demi vie plus courte que l'autre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os gráficos mostram a deterioração exponencial 
de uma substância radioativa a tempo. O gráfico esquerdo 
ilustra o half-life de uma substância enquanto deteriora a tempo. 
O gráfico direito mostra a deterioração radioativa de dois 
materiais, uma que tem um half-life mais curto do que a outra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I grafici mostrano il decadimento esponenziale di 
una sostanza radioattiva a tempo. Il grafico di sinistra 
illustra il periodo radioattivo di una sostanza mentre decade a tempo.
Il giusto grafico mostra il deperimento radioattivo di due 
materiali, uno che ha un periodo radioattivo più corto che l'altro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι γραφικές παραστάσεις εμφανίζουν εκθετική 
αποσύνθεση μιας ραδιενεργού ουσίας εγκαίρως. Η αριστερή 
γραφική παράσταση επεξηγεί την ημιζωή μιας ουσίας όπως 
αποσυντίθεται εγκαίρως. Η σωστή γραφική παράσταση 
εμφανίζει ραδιενεργό αποσύνθεση δύο υλικών, μια που έχει μια 
πιό σύντομη ημιζωή από άλλη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los gráficos muestran el decaimiento exponencial 
de una sustancia radiactiva en tiempo. El gráfico izquierdo 
ilustra el período de una sustancia mientras que se decae en tiempo. 
El gráfico derecho muestra el decaimiento radiactivo de dos 
materiales, uno que tiene un período más corto que el otro.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">radioaktiver Zerfall</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">radioaktive Substanzen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Halbwertzeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">radioaktive Materialien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Radioaktivität</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">substances radioactives</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">demi vie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">matériaux radioactifs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">radioactivité</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">deterioração radioativa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">substâncias radioativas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">half-life</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">materiali radioattivi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ραδιενεργός αποσύνθεση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
